| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1530](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1530 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c")                                                                                                                                                                                                       |

The **carrion crawler** is a monster added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It is notable for having 6 attacks, each of which can cause paralysis.

## Strategy

Not a great threat. High [magic cancellation](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation") renders their attacks mostly ineffective, and they do very little damage. Try not to fight them when other monsters are around, just in case they manage to paralyze you. Their paralysis does not last long enough to be terribly dangerous, however.

Their corpses can be eaten for a chance at [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), although they appear somewhat later in the game.
html:
Carrion crawler

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
s carrion crawler
Difficulty 12
Attacks Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis
s carrion crawler
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis, Touch 1d1 paralysis

Base level 3
Base experience 67
Speed 12
Base AC 3
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 50
Nutritional value 100
Size Large
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed poison (20%)

A carrion crawler:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1530

The carrion crawler is a monster added in SLASH'EM. It is notable for having 6 attacks, each of which can cause paralysis.

Strategy

Not a great threat. High magic cancellation renders their attacks mostly ineffective, and they do very little damage. Try not to fight them when other monsters are around, just in case they manage to paralyze you. Their paralysis does not last long enough to be terribly dangerous, however.

Their corpses can be eaten for a chance at poison resistance, although they appear somewhat later in the game.

The '''carrion crawler''' is a monster added in [[SLASH'EM]]. It is notable for having 6 attacks, each of which can cause paralysis. 
==Strategy==
Not a great threat.  High [[magic cancellation]] renders their attacks mostly ineffective, and they do very little damage.  Try not to fight them when other monsters are around, just in case they manage to paralyze you.  Their paralysis does not last long enough to be terribly dangerous, however.

Their corpses can be eaten for a chance at [[poison resistance]], although they appear somewhat later in the game.
